column4: Hi guy's need help I plug and disconnected a monitor and lost 3d in unity how can I fix this
ok, reboot and log in to the unity3D session, then log off and log into the 2D sessin and read:  /var/log/Xorg.0.log   may give clues
forgot to ask what do we look for
ok do you want me to do with the file
down the left side you will see (II)  which are informational
(WW) which are warnings (nothing major but should be noted)
ok give me a while back soon
i suggest you uninstall the nvidia driver, reboot then reinstall it
removed Nvidia and tried to reinstall Nvidia no luck any more suggestion?
